module.name: Misc Destinations
module.description: Allows creating destinations that dial any local number (extensions, feature codes, outside phone numbers) that can be used by other modules (eg, IVR, time conditions) as a call destination.
module.changelog: *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *2.11.0.4* #1953 *2.11.0.2* Include license file *2.11.0.1* Using new wrapper function for last insert id *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* set repository *2.9.0.0* #4653
